activities: Evo receives personal information when users download Evo developed mobile applications and create user accounts with information required for monitoring their homes, babies, energy. These applications can connect to purchased devices that collect user data for delivery of services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: User account information - names, addresses, phone number,emails, children information, location information, in home event information
